price: ‹ ߊߟߊ߫ › ߘߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߫ ߥߛߎ߬ ߛߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߕߜߋߣߍ߲߫ ߸ ߣߴߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߕߘߍ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߓߴߏ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߠߊ߫
arabic: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ لَّوۡ أَنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla in labith'tum illā qalīlan law annakum kuntum taʿlamūna
